summary: Changes the enchantments on the Amulets of the Divines to match the Blessings gained from their Shrines.
descriptionHtml:
This not only changes the Amulets enchantments to match the blessings gained from shrines, it also changes the Blessing of Akatosh to match the enchantment of the Amulet of Akatosh and fixes the Blessing of Talos description so that it displays correctly.

If I leave something off, it is unchanged.

Blessing of Akatosh
Regenerate Magicka, 25 pts for 8 hours (used to be 10 pts)

Blessing of Talos
Should now properly display that time between shouts is reduced by 20% instead of 0%

Amulet of Arkay
Fortify Health, 25 pts (used to be 10 pts)

Amulet of Dibella
Fortify Persuasion 10 pts (used to be 15 pts)

Amulet of Julianos
Fortify Magicka, 25 pts (used to be 10 pts)

Amulet of Kynareth
Fortify Stamina, 25 pts (used to be 10 pts)


Credits:
Thanks to Bethesda for creating an awesome series of games.
author: Doctor Black
